title: 80s movie font help?
content:
Hi

Sorry but I am new to all this font lark. I was wondering if anyone could help me with working out which font is which? I need to know the fonts to the following movies is possible

Pretty in Pink

![]()http://needles.guzzlingcakes.com/images/pretty\_in\_pink.jpg

Weird Science

![]()http://mlm.business-opportunities.biz/wp-content/uploads/2007/02/weird\_science.jpg

Flashdance

![]()http://tf.org/images/covers/Flashdance.jpg

The Breakfast Club

![]()http://sitemaker.umich.edu/dolan.356/files/654439\_dv\_l\_f.jpg

Again, apologies if they are obvious and thanks for your help in advance

Clare
author: tankgirl

comments.content: Crikey that was quick! One down 3 to go. THanks very much!
